task.title: Merge PDF files
task.shortdesc: Select the files you want to merge using Acrobat PDF combiner tool.

prereq.p: You should have Acrobat PDF combiner tool installed on your system.

context.p: Combine multiple PDF files into a single PDF document.

step.cmd: Open the PDF combiner tool, and then select Navigator - Publisher Set.
step.stepresult:
The Navigator - Publisher Set window opens.
Navigator - publisher Set window

step.cmd: Under Views, select the files to merge.
Scroll down to Floor Plans, to view list of files selected.

image.alt: List of files visible under Floor Plan section of the window

step.cmd: Select the Merge to one PDF file .
Select Publish to complete the task.

taskbody.result: All the files are now merged into one PDF file.
